text: Hurrimat `Alaykumu Al-Maytatu Wa Ad-Damu Wa Lahmu Al-Khinziri Wa Ma 'Uhilla Lighayri Allahi Bihi Wa Al-Munkhaniqatu Wa Al-Mawqudhatu Wa Al-Mutaraddiyatu Wa An-Natihatu Wa Ma 'Akala As-Sabu`u 'Illa Ma Dhakkaytum Wa Ma Dhubiha `Ala An-Nusubi Wa 'An Tastaqsimu Bil-'Azlami Dhalikum Fisqun Al-Yawma Ya'isa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min Dinikum Fala Takhshawhum Wa Akhshawni Al-Yawma 'Akmaltu Lakum Dinakum Wa 'Atmamtu `Alaykum Ni`mati Wa Rađitu Lakumu Al-'Islama Dinaan Famani Ađturra Fi Makhmasatin Ghayra Mutajanifin L'ithmin Fa'inna Allaha Ghafurun Rahimun
